original: 九江壽春人，東吳官員，蔣欽之子。蔣欽死後，長子蔣壹承其爵位兵權，與曹魏交戰，臨陣戰死，續由蔣休領兵，後蔣休因罪免職。
text: Jiujiang Shouchun, official of Soochow, son of Jiang Qin. After Jiang Qin's death, the eldest son Jiang Yi assumed the military power of his knighthood, fought Cao Wei, and died in battle. Jiang Xiu led the army, and Jiang Xiu was removed due to crime.
